name: We Were Forever 🔥
description:
Ember has outlived everyone they know. When they finally die after meeting a person with a pair of fiery wings, they find themself reborn as a child over and over again. Unable to forget the one with the same wings as them, Ember searches for their soul mate.

Living and dying, always finding each other. Forever.

Right?

Awiola - directior, GUI and CG artist

Pumpkin-Spike - writer

Cygni - editor, programmer

high-tea - BG artist

Maricu - character artist

Cross Couloir - composer
